mapper.select: select signer_id as signerId from contract_record where contract_record.user_id = #{userId} limit 1

select *,contract_template.templateId ,contract_template.company_id as companyId from contract_record left join contract_template on contract_record.template_id = contract_template.id where user_id = #{userId} and status in (0,2) and contract_record.dr = 0 and contract_record.product_id IN ( select product_id from sys_business_product where business_id = #{businessId} )

select count(1) from contract_record where 1 = 1 and dr = 0
and user_id = #{userId}
and status in(0,2)
and product_id in ( select product_id from sys_business_product where business_id = #{businessId} )
select company_id as companyId from contract_record where contract_id = #{contractId}
